article: My  _  home is in the country  . The air there is fresh and it is  _ . My house is very beautiful. There are three floors. There is a river  in front of my house and behind  it is a big garden. I can _ trees and flowers in it .I like to see green everywhere and green is my _ color. I like to work in the _ and fish in the river. I'd like to invite my friends at my home .Then we can chat and play games. How _ we are.
